minesweeper.domain

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.domain.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends Object
    Contains information about game cells and has basic methods to change it's status.
    Author:
    juri

    • Method Detail

      • isFlagged

        public boolean isFlagged()
        Returns:
        Cells flagged status.

      • isMine

        public boolean isMine()
        Returns:
        Does the cell have a mine.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Returns:
        Is the cell open.

      • setOpen

        public void setOpen()
        Sets the Cells open status to true. Does nothing if the Cell is flagged or already opened.

      • setMine

        public void setMine()
        Set the Cells mine status to true.

      • toggleFlag

        public void toggleFlag()
        Toggles the cells flag status. If the cell is flagged it will remove the flag. If the cell is not flagged it will flag it.

      • getAdjacentMineCount

        public int getAdjacentMineCount()

      • increaseAdjacentMineCount

        public void increaseAdjacentMineCount()
        Increases the known amount of adjacent mines. Used by minefield class.
